mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prompt_template (name, task_type, description, template_text, model, version, is_active) VALUES (#{name}, #{taskType}, #{description}, #{templateText}, #{model}, #{version}, #{isActive});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM prompt_template ORDER BY updated_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE prompt_template SET name = #{name}, task_type = #{taskType}, description = #{description}, template_text = #{templateText}, model = #{model}, version = #{version}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
